article_title: Landscape shifts: Democrats could take control of Senate

article_metadata.title: Landscape shifts: Democrats could take control of Senate | McClatchy DC

og.description: There’s another pivotal election next year besides the White House. The Senate is up for grabs, and the landscape a year out suggests the Democrats could win control away from the Republicans.
